name: Aymaan Mulla
position: Full-Stack Developer | Python Backend | React Frontend  | Docker  | Building Scalable Solutions & Engaging User Interfaces
about: As a Full-Stack Developer with strong expertise in Python and React, I am focused on delivering innovative solutions that drive business success. My background includes three internships and diverse projects, resulting in a 30% increase in performance and user engagement. I excel in software testing using Jira, achieving a 45% reduction in defects through rigorous protocols. Proficient in Docker, I streamline containerization and improve deployment efficiency by 25%. My experience with blockchain technologies allows me to develop decentralized applications and smart contracts. I am seeking opportunities to leverage my skills in dynamic environments, collaborating with talented teams to create meaningful impact. Let’s connect to explore how we can achieve exceptional results together!

experience.title: Embedded Software Developer
experience.description: ●	Developed and implemented embedded system solutions to address complex issues faced by doctors during eye surgery, enhancing surgical precision and efficiency.●	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and test innovative medical devices, incorporating feedback from medical professionals to ensure practical applicability.●	Leveraged prior knowledge in project management to streamline project workflows, resulting in a 20% reduction in development time.●	Applied expertise in robotics to troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges, contributing to successful project outcomes and improving device performance.●	Conducted rigorous testing and validation to ensure the reliability and safety of embedded systems in clinical environments
experience.description_html:
● Developed and implemented embedded system solutions to address complex issues faced by doctors during eye surgery, enhancing surgical precision and efficiency.
● Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and test innovative medical devices, incorporating feedback from medical professionals to ensure practical applicability.
● Leveraged prior knowledge in project management to streamline project workflows, resulting in a 20% reduction in development time.
● Applied expertise in robotics to troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges, contributing to successful project outcomes and improving device performance.
● Conducted rigorous testing and validation to ensure the reliability and safety of embedded systems in clinical environments

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: ●	Project: Developed a robotic arm for remote surgery solutions tailored for villages in India, including an accompanying control app.●	Responsibilities:○	Coordinated a team of 4 members to deliver the project within the given timeline and budget of ₹1.24 lakhs.○	Managed project timelines, assigned tasks, and ensured smooth communication among team members.○	Oversaw the development process, tracked progress, and provided regular updates to stakeholders.○	Contributed to the design and implementation of the control app for the robotic arm
experience.description_html:
● Project: Developed a robotic arm for remote surgery solutions tailored for villages in India, including an accompanying control app.
● Responsibilities:
○ Coordinated a team of 4 members to deliver the project within the given timeline and budget of ₹1.24 lakhs.
○ Managed project timelines, assigned tasks, and ensured smooth communication among team members.
○ Oversaw the development process, tracked progress, and provided regular updates to stakeholders.
○ Contributed to the design and implementation of the control app for the robotic arm

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: ●	Increased faculty data engagement by 30% through the development of a scalable PHP backend with a CRUD REST API and a user-friendly dashboard, resulting in a 25% decrease in data-related queries.●	Maintained a 99.9% uptime for the API and dashboard by implementing comprehensive error handling and logging mechanisms, ensuring continuous reliability and performance.●	Enhanced API performance with an average response time of 200ms by optimizing caching mechanisms and refining database query efficiency.●	Delivered the project successfully, showcasing advanced backend development skills and effective remote collaboration.
experience.description_html:
● Increased faculty data engagement by 30% through the development of a scalable PHP backend with a CRUD REST API and a user-friendly dashboard, resulting in a 25% decrease in data-related queries.
● Maintained a 99.9% uptime for the API and dashboard by implementing comprehensive error handling and logging mechanisms, ensuring continuous reliability and performance.
● Enhanced API performance with an average response time of 200ms by optimizing caching mechanisms and refining database query efficiency.
● Delivered the project successfully, showcasing advanced backend development skills and effective remote collaboration.

projects: [{"title":"Censorship-Resistant web3 DAPP a YouTube Clone","description":"a decentralized YouTube clone built on the Ethereum blockchain, utilizing IPFS for storage and ReactJS for the frontend. This Web3 DApp ensures censorship resistance, allowing creators to share content freely.*Key Features:*1. Decentralized video storage using IPFS2. Smart contract-based content moderation3. Web3.js integration for seamless user experience4. ReactJS frontend for responsive design5. Solidity-based smart contract development6. Censorship-resistant content sharing*Technical Specifications:*1. Blockchain: Ethereum2. Storage: IPFS3. Frontend: ReactJS4. Smart Contract Language: Solidity5. Web3 Library: Web3.js*Benefits:*1. Resistance to censorship and content tampering2. Decentralized, community-driven moderation3. Enhanced user data security and privacy4. Incentivized content creation through token rewards"},{},{},{},{"title":"E-voting system using blockchain","description":"Developed a Cutting-Edge e-Voting System Innovative Tech Stack: Created a secure and transparent e-Voting system using a blend of modern technologies. The frontend was built with React.js, while two backends were employed for robust performance—MERN stack for vote verification and Ethereum blockchain integration using Ether.js and Truffle.Advanced Verification: Implemented a dual-layer verification process combining facial recognition and email validation. Utilized Python for facial ID data processing to ensure voter authenticity before casting a vote.Seamless Integration: Leveraged MongoDB to manage and cross-analyze voting data, ensuring accurate and tamper-proof results by comparing backend verifications with Ethereum blockchain data.Impact: Enhanced the security and integrity of the voting process, demonstrating a practical application of blockchain technology in elections and providing a model for future digital voting solutions."},{},{},{"title":"Handwritten Digit Recognition using CNN","description":"- Developed an AI model in Python utilizing Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) with TensorFlow- Trained on a dataset of 50,000+ images of handwritten digits (0-9)- Achieved accurate recognition of handwritten numbers, regardless of writing style or orientation- Utilized existing dataset from MNIST for training and validation- Demonstrated expertise in: - Deep learning (CNN) - Image processing - TensorFlow - Python*Project Details*- Dataset: 50,000+ images of handwritten digits (0-9)- Model Architecture: Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)- Framework: TensorFlow- Programming Language: Python- Accuracy: 87.5%- Features: - Handwritten digit recognition - Robust to varying writing styles and orientations - Trained on large dataset for improved accuracy"},{"title":"IoT-Powered Robotic Arm System for Enhanced Surgery","description":"- Developed a surgical robotic arm system using Raspberry Pi, achieving 99.9% precision in arm movements- Integrated with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) IoT Hub for real-time monitoring and control, reducing latency by 30%- Utilized web sockets for bidirectional communication, enabling 500+ concurrent connections- Implemented Python programming for robotic arm control, data processing, and analysis, reducing processing time by 40%- Demonstrated expertise in integrating robotics, IoT, and cloud technologies, with a 95% success rate in surgical simulations- Showcased potential to revolutionize surgical procedures, reducing complications by 25%"},{},{"title":"Metaverse","description":"The metaverse-ar-vr-nft project is a cutting-edge initiative that seeks to blend virtual and physical worlds seamlessly. It aims to leverage the latest advancements in technology such as augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR), and non-fungible tokens (NFTs) to create an immersive experience that blurs the line between reality and digital existence.The project seeks to create a metaverse where individuals can interact with a virtual world using AR and VR technology. Users will be able to create avatars, own virtual real estate, and even trade digital assets using NFTs. The metaverse will offer a seamless experience, allowing users to switch between virtual and physical reality easily.The AR and VR components of the project will be used to create an immersive environment that mimics the real world, allowing users to interact with objects and other users in a more realistic way. The technology will also allow users to create and manipulate digital objects, enhancing the creative potential of the metaverse.The NFT component of the project will enable users to own unique digital assets such as virtual real estate, artwork, and other rare collectibles. These assets will be stored on a blockchain, ensuring that they are unique, scarce, and verifiable.Overall, the metaverse-ar-vr-nft project has the potential to revolutionize the way we interact with digital content and each other. It will provide a new platform for creativity, social interaction, and commerce in a way that has never been seen before.we have used these things in the-metaverse
